author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Orleanpet Police on Friday arrested a youth from Panruti, Cuddalore district for illegal possession of 350 g of ganja.

Tip-of

Following a tip-of, police personnel mounted surveillance over the movements of passengers at the bus stand. Police said that they found a man moving under suspicious circumstances in the bus stand.

While inquiring, police found M. Prahaladhan (27) of Cuddalore possessing ganja illegally for distribution. They seized the ganja and arrested him.
title: Youth arrested for possessing ganja
